info.description: API to track environmental sensor data for beekeepers
info.title: HiveBox

get.description:
Liveness probe endpoint for Kubernetes.
Returns 200 if app is alive (can handle requests).

Prometheus metrics endpoint
Returns all default and custom metrics in Prometheus format

Kubernetes readiness probe

Returns HTTP 200 only if:
- Less than 50% of senseBoxes are unavailable
- AND cache is not older than 5 minutes

Get average temperature from configured senseBoxes

- Data must be no older than 1 hour
- Uses Valkey cache (5 minute TTL)
- Returns temperature with status based on thresholds
- Increments Prometheus metrics

Get the current application version.

Returns:
    dict: Version information
